title: Triple Feature Disaster Movies | 40 Days And Nights + The Apocalypse + Apocalypse Pompeii

sources.title: Triple Feature Disaster Movies | 40 Days And Nights + The Apocalypse + Apocalypse Pompeii
sources.description:
40 Days And Nights: When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.
2012.  Stars: Alex Carter, Monica Keena, Alex Arleo

The Apocalypse: In this epic disaster film of faith, a mother and father search for their only child as a giant asteroid headed for Earth triggers a series of apocalyptic events.
2007.  Stars: Rhett Giles, Jill Stapley, Kristen Quintrall

Apocalypse Pompeii: Mount Vesuvius erupts when a family visits Pompeii. The daughter uses her skill and her father his ability, in order to escape the disaster.
2014.  Stars: Adrian Paul, Jhey Castles, Georgina Beedle
